metadata.title: CVE-2023-52650 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/tegra: dsi: Add missing check for of_find_device_by_node Add check forthe return value of of_find_device_by_node() and return the error if itfails in order to avoid NULL pointer dereference.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
